verses.roman:
pūjārī āniyā mālā-prasādānna dilā
prasādānna-mālā pāñā prabhu harṣa hailā

synonyms: pūjārī—the priest; āniyā—bringing; mālā—garlands; prasāda-anna—remnants of food; dilā—offered; prasāda-anna—the prasāda; mālā—and garlands; pāñā—getting; prabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; harṣa—pleased; hailā—became.
translation: The priest there presented Him with garlands and prasāda that had been offered to Lord Jagannātha. This pleased Caitanya Mahāprabhu very much.
